Material used.Material Source: Small unilamellar vesicles (SUVs) and membrane mimics
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using SUVs and membrane mimics.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_002406.3:c.140C>G exhibited abnormal folding characteristics, with a gain-of-function effect.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type a-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
